data.message: Some one hack me last night around 6:00 o'clock pretending they were a friend of mine trying to get me to go into another app saying that I'm on a government list and I would be receiving thousands of dollars said ups would be delivering the money it sounded fishy so I asked how my mothers doing an they said she doing great, busted moms been dead for about 3yrs now

replies.message: Hi Susan. Please report this message as spam. To do so, follow these steps listed in our Help Center: http://bit.ly/2bVZrE4. -Jessica
